someone who believes in Jainism (= a religion originally from India): The strictest Jains will not eat carrots or garlic. Like Hindus, Jains believe in karma. Related word
Jainism
More examplesFewer examplesHe is a Jain, and does not believe in killing animals.The Jains are known for their strict vegetarianism.Einstein once expressed a wish to be reborn as a Jain.
